name: Luxury Villa in Beverly Hills
detail: A stunning villa located in the heart of Beverly Hills. This property offers 5 bedrooms, 4 bathrooms, a large swimming pool, and a private garden.

name: Modern Apartment in New York
detail: A stylish modern apartment in downtown Manhattan. This 2-bedroom apartment features a spacious living area, modern kitchen, and floor-to-ceiling windows with a skyline view.

name: Beach House in Malibu
detail: A beautiful beach house with direct access to Malibu beach. Featuring 3 bedrooms, a spacious deck, and panoramic ocean views.
